Text: The modified AR flag is read by VLC and KMPlayer (probably most others), but not by PowerDVD (probably not by stand-alones either). If you can manually set AR it should be to 5:4, or frame size to  528x422 (if the image looks squashed)

there are four full essays on this site starting with this one:
http://www.gorevidalpages.com/2001/09/gore-vidal-september-11-end-of-liberty.html
